comments.author: fsticken_sp@niksoftware.com
comments.text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:5.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/5.0
Build ID: 20110615151330

Steps to reproduce:

Move firefox window to second screen.
Click on a menu button (actually any button anywhere which triggers an overlay works).

See also description of bug https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=230674


Actual results:

Overlay flickers (menu items not visible).


Expected results:

Menu items should be visible.
comments.creator: fsticken_sp@niksoftware.com
